text:
AI is changing the world much faster than you can 
imagine many tools have recently surfaced that

will allow people to be 10 times more productive 
with these AI tools you now have the ability to

get more done faster all with significantly less 
effort giving you a huge advantage over your peers

if you act fast which is why today I'm going to 
show you six mind-blowing tools that I've come

across pay close attention and think about how 
you can use each of these tools to gain that extra

edge with that being said let's Jump Right In 
starting off at number one we have Runway ml which

is a powerful video and photo editing AI tool 
if you are a content creator who wants to speed

up their editing process or if you are an aspiring 
business owner who wants to create content without

having to pay someone else this is the tool for 
you here are some of the features that Runway

has it allows you to upload images of yourself and 
get hundreds of variations which can be great for

creating thumbnails it allows you to remove the 
background of any image instantly it allows you to

create any image by simply feeding it some text it 
allows you to modify any existing image and change

its style it allows you to take an existing image 
and expand the scenery around it it allows you to

remove any objects or person from any video and 
even replace it with something else it allows

you to color grade any video by simply writing 
a description of what you want it allows you to

automatically split any video into Clips it can 
even do audio work by getting rid of background

noise reducing pauses between speaking and even 
generating subtitles they're constantly adding

new features so it's definitely a good idea to 
keep this tool on your radar next up we have copy

AI this is an all-purpose copywriting AI that will 
speed up your writing and content creation process

it has a ton of tools that can help you whenever 
you're stuck and don't know what's right let me

give you an example of how you can use copy AI to 
write for your blog or even a script for a YouTube

video I'm going to click on blog post wizard 
which brings me to this page which will help me

create the outline for my piece for blog title I'm 
going to use the example of organic soaps which is

something that I've been thinking about recently 
so we can do something like the five and negative

consequences of using soap for the keywords 
I'm going to use soap endocrine disruptors

testosterone and hormones and I'm going to change 
the tone to Friendly this instantly generates an

outline for the piece I can delete the ones that 
I don't think I'll need feed and also rearrange

them so that the flow of my piece makes the most 
sense once I'm happy with what I got I can then

click generate talking points where it'll break 
down each of these bullet points into much smaller

points giving us more details we can then ask it 
to use all of these talking points to write entire

paragraphs which we can then manually edit to our 
liking there are a lot more features such as their

social media tools which includes a hook generator 
that can help you come up with good ways to start

your scripts and videos a title generator that 
will help you come up with titles for your videos

and blogs and even a suite of brainstorming tools 
that will help you generate ideas that you can

use and there are even tools for writing cover 
letters if you're looking for a job moving on

we have quill bot this is a paraphrasing AI as it 
currently stands in the education system students

are quickly catching on to the fact that they can 
use AI to help speed up their essays and projects

now of course teachers have tried to fight back 
by using using AI detecting AIS which can spot

AI generated text this is where quill bot comes in 
it takes existing sentences and it rephrases them

so you can take everything that's given to you in 
chatgpt or copy Ai and run it through quill bot

to make it harder for your teacher to detect here 
we take some text written by Chachi PT and as you

can see if we bring it to an AI detecting website 
it says that the majority of the text was written

by an AI but if you bring it into quill bot and 
have it rephrase everything and put it back into

that website it no longer becomes detectable I'm 
not suggesting that you cheat on your homework I

think you should use these tools to Simply speed 
up your work or when you have writer's block and

overall I strongly believe that those who do 
not use AI tools to their advantage will get

left in the dust in this new world the clever ones 
will always use technology to their advantage so

it's your choice which actually brings us to the 
sponsors of today's video brilliant brilliant is a

an app where you can learn math computer 
science and other interesting subjects in

stem what's great about them is that they do not 
teach by merely stating facts or formulas and

making you memorize things instead they employ an 
interactive teaching style that makes learning fun

you're given intriguing questions that test your 
knowledge and fill in your gaps and misconceptions

when you come across a gap in your knowledge they 
provide you with the correct answer as well as an

explanation as to why my favorite course right 
now is Introduction to neural networks I now

believe that if you want to have a successful 
career business you will have to understand how

AI works and this introductory course is great 
for that it goes over how machines are capable

of detecting patterns in huge amounts of data 
if you want to ensure that you stay on top of

these world-changing Trends I suggest you go to 
brilliant.org forward slash Improvement pill to

sign up for free the first 200 people click on 
the link in the description box below will get

20 off their yearly plan so act fast now back to 
the topic at hand the fourth AI tool that we have

on today's list is assembly AI this is an AI that 
specializes in taking audio files and transcribing

them not only that but it has the ability to 
summarize the content of the audio which means

that it can help you if you are a student you can 
record the audio of your lectures while you're in

class or on a zoom call and then you can upload 
the files onto assembly where it will transcribe

everything for you this way you can relax and 
focus more on what's in front of you in class

assembly has a couple of additional features such 
as sentiment analysis which can be used for those

of you that like to trade stocks you can quickly 
get an idea of what the general sentiment of the

market is by feeding It audio files of Talking 
Heads Up fifth we have talk to books which is

actually an AI by Google this is a helpful tool 
that you can use to speed up any research you

need to do or if you want to find answers to any 
of your problems you simply enter a question or

phrase and the AI will scour its entire library of 
books to find any relevant passages here's a quick

demonstration situation I'm going to ask it how 
to be happy and it will instantly show me a page

filled with passages that relates to my question 
I don't see anything interesting so I'm going to

click view more passages until I get to something 
that I like here we have a concept that intrigues

me which is the four circles of Happiness so I'm 
going to click on view in book to read more about

the subject and as you can see this really helps 
me speed up my research and also idea creation

process and finally at number six we have a 
quirky tool called huberman AI if you're ever

too lazy to listen to Andrew huberman's two-hour 
plus long lectures you can refer to this tool you

basically give it any word or question and it 
will look through all of huberman's work and

give you the exact time stamps where he speaks 
about the subjects you're interested in here's

a quick demonstration I switched to search 
episodes and type in the phrase sleep faster

and just like that it spits out over a dozen 
moments where huberman speaks about sleeping

faster you can quickly skim through all of them 
and find one that you're interested in and jump

to that time stamp to learn more this could 
potentially save you a lot of time if you're

looking for a quick answer to your question but 
of course I would still recommend listening to

his entire lectures so that you can learn exactly 
about how and why some of his advice works I hope

you find some of the tools that I covered in 
this video helpful besides that stay tuned
